EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Data Microservices with Spring Cloud Data Flow.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Data Microservices with Spring Cloud Data Flow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Data Microservices with Spring Cloud Data Flow on Tuesday, May 24, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, May 24, 2016 Time: 3:00PM Time (London, GMT)
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1175669/537B2F194F11C13F570F173A0194845B]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
